articles.content: All the signs are there. Philip Osborne (Owen Teale) started off the series as the chief inspector who demanded that a young DS Steve Arnott (Martin Compston) lie about what went wrong during a faile… [+1148 chars]

articles.author: Emily Ferguson
articles.title: Camilla should NOT become Queen when Prince Charles takes the throne – Britons speak out - Express
articles.description: CAMILLA, Duchess of Cornwall, should not become Queen when her husband Prince Charles becomes King, a new poll has found.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Morris dancers ditch black face paint and swap it for blue following racism concerns - Sky News
articles.description: The tradition is believed to have derived from poor farm workers in the 1400s using soot to disguise themselves so they could beg.

articles.title: Nomadland review – Chloe Zhao’s triumphant ode to community - The Guardian
articles.description: Zhao’s triple Oscar winner, inspired by the ‘new nomads’ of recession-hit America, eschews conflict in favour of quiet humanity

articles.author: Abbie Bray
articles.title: Naga Munchetty and Charlie Stayt replaced in BBC Breakfast shake-up - Express
articles.description: NAGA MUNCHETTY and Charlie Stayt were replaced on Sunday morning's BBC Breakfast by Roger Johnson and Sima Kotecha, who stepped in to take their place.
